item.title: Building my website
item.description:
Why did I decide to build a personal website?

Overall, the goal is to share more of about what I have going on than can be found on my LinkedIn because it’s really just a resume and I really don’t use the social media aspects of it or any other social media platforms.

Creating a personal website has been a goal of mine for a while now, and while this is not the first version of an online platform for my content, I think this is a better one. Previously, I used streamlit to build and deploy a personal webpage along with an LLM application. As a python programmer, I found it quite simple and intuitive (in fact I may still continue to use it for other projects). After deploying on the free “Community Cloud” I discovered that after a while with no traffic the whole application shut’s down (which is fair).
